text: The 1881 Randolph–Macon Yellow Jackets football team represented Randolph- Macon College during the 1881 college football season.http://rmcathletics.com/sports/fball/fball-history ==Schedule== ==References== Randolph Macon Category:Randolph–Macon Yellow Jackets football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Category:1881 in sports in Virginia
